Room.Name: Jungle Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on an east-west road running through the lush jungle on Rum Island.
Room.LongDescription: The road heads toward the sound of surf to the west, while to the east you can see a group of ramshackle buildings and hear a lot of loud music and laughter. A crudely lettered sign nearby has an arrow pointing west, and tells you the island cemetery is that way. A human skull hangs from the top of the sign, and it seems to still have eyes which glare at you. A hasty hand has added to the sign, "Stay Away! Voodoo!!"
